items.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
items.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based recommendation system to suggest relevant products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 relevant product suggestions for each user session
Recommendations update in real-time based on user interactions
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing
non_functional: Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: Assumed that the platform already has a product catalog and user tracking in place; specific AI model type and training data sources not provided.
